languages.text: "Только посмотри: молодые, сильные, жаркие тела. Страх придает их крови особенно сладкий привкус".

traits.locale_text: "Только посмотри: молодые, сильные, жаркие тела. Страх придает их крови особенно сладкий привкус".

languages.text: "Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."
languages.original_text: "Только посмотри: молодые, сильные, жаркие тела. Страх придает их крови особенно сладкий привкус".

traits.locale_text: "Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."
"Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."
"Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."
"Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."
"Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."
"Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."

languages.text: « Ah, ces corps jeunes, chauds et vigoureux. La peur donne à leur sang un arrière-goût particulièrement délectable. »
languages.original_text: "Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, ces corps jeunes, chauds et vigoureux. La peur donne à leur sang un arrière-goût particulièrement délectable. »

languages.text: «Mira esos cuerpos jóvenes, fuertes y calentitos. El miedo le da un regusto dulzón a su sangre».
languages.original_text: "Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."

traits.locale_text: «Mira esos cuerpos jóvenes, fuertes y calentitos. El miedo le da un regusto dulzón a su sangre».

languages.text: 「あの若くてたくましく熱を持った体を見てごらんよ。恐怖心のおかげで、彼らの血にとりわけ甘い後味が生まれる」
languages.original_text: "Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."

traits.locale_text: 「あの若くてたくましく熱を持った体を見てごらんよ。恐怖心のおかげで、彼らの血にとりわけ甘い後味が生まれる」

languages.text: “看看那些年轻、强壮、温热的身体吧，恐惧会让他们甜美的血液回味无穷。”
languages.original_text: "Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."

traits.locale_text: “看看那些年轻、强壮、温热的身体吧，恐惧会让他们甜美的血液回味无穷。”

languages.text: "Seht euch diese jungen, starken, warmen Körper an. Furcht verleiht ihrem Blut einen besonders süßen Nachgeschmack."
languages.original_text: "Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."

traits.locale_text: "Seht euch diese jungen, starken, warmen Körper an. Furcht verleiht ihrem Blut einen besonders süßen Nachgeschmack."

languages.text: "Şu gencecik, kuvvetli ve sıcacık bedenlere bak. Kanları, korku sayesinde ağızda bilhassa şekerli bir tat bırakıyor."
languages.original_text: "Just look at those young, strong, warm bodies. Fear gives their blood an especially sweet aftertaste."
